titleStmt.title: Clarissimo, generosissimo, ac colen dissimo domino, D. Thomæ Kennedy A. Kirkhill, equiti aurato, & reip. Edinburgenæ consuli amplissimo, ... hasce ingenii primitias, juvenes candidati, hac vice ex Athenæo regio Jacobi sexti Edinburgeno, cum laurea magisterali emittendi, in perpetuam amoris & honoris tesseram ...
titleStmt.author: Massie, Andrew, d. 1721.

publicationStmt.publisher: excudebat hæres Andreæ Anderson, civitatis & Academiæ Typographus,

notesStmt.note: Signed and dated at end: Andreæ Massæi. Juli 11. 1687.
With a list of graduates in five columns beneath the title, and a list of theses in three columns beneath the list of graduates.
Reproduction of the original in the Edinburgh University Library.
